WorkItem.Description:

Comments.Message: Brant and I took a look at this today. We made some progress, and Brant is continuing that progress. It seems that the latest version of mongodb included a new authentication scheme, which appharbor adopted, but which our software was not participating in. Brant is in the process of upgrading the c# mongo driver, the latest version of which has the up-to-date authentication scheme.
Associated with changeset 71084: Further attempts to get appharor working again. Updated the MongoMembership package to the latest version. Hopefully this will solve the authentication issue...
Associated with changeset 71085: Mirroring package updates into dev branch...
Fixed. I finally go Appharbor to build the version with the fixed web.config.
